rukus.text: Al â€˜Aad ni send their frat Hood Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi tiam observ righteousness
Estr disbelieved his popol dir Ni seg vi behaving foolishly ni opini vi est liar
Li dir O my popol tie ne est foolishness me mi est messenger Lord univers
Mi liver vi my Lord's messages mi honestly advising vi
Est gxi tro mult de wonder ke message ven vi your Lord hom vi avert vi? Recall ti Li far vi inheritors popol Noah multiplied your numer! Memor di blessings ke vi sukces
Ili dir vi ven far us worship DI sol abandon ki our parents uz worship Ni challenge vi bring doom vi minac us vi est truthful
Li dir Vi incurred condemnation wrath your Lord Do vi argue me innovations vi fabricated - Vi your parents - which neniam authorized DI? Do wait mi wait vi
Ni tiam sav him those him per mercy el us ni annihilated those rejected our revelations rifuz est believers
